resources.string:
The room is ---- because it is crowded.

1. Stale" "2. Stuffy
3. Blue" 4. Noisy
Hard Work Pays Off! Keep it up!!
Welcome to WordExplore! We are so excited to have you here. Use this app to play, develop and improve your vocabulary using the very useful video links, dictionary feature and fun games!

string.name: videoTitle
string.u: CLICK HERE FOR SOME FUN VIDEO LINKS!

resources.string: Click on one of the 2 game buttons below to embark on a fun and exciting learning journey! Pressing the game button will start the game so be ready to jump straight into action!
